Scene:
The Pawnshop
(Shichimise / 質店)

Play: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu (染模様妹背門松)

Production: February 1990



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Seiji (鶴澤清治)



Performers:
